```
     - name: create home page for default site
        copy: src=index.html dest=/usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
    ```

```
     - name: create home page for default site
       template:
         src: index.html.j2
         dest: /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
    ```

    $ mv customhosts environments/dev
